trends: There has been one other sighting in Newport
There were no other sightings in Newport on or around November 5th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi haven seen these on more than one occasion... i started seeing them around march of this year (20130 and at first i thought i was just seeing things. the first one i saw stayed in the same exact spot and just pulsated for exactly three hours, i have seen at least 30 since. today 11\5 driving home from work on 75 south i saw a bright light in the sky around 6:00pm it was very faint at first but as i kept going down the highway it got brighter and closer. i was stuck in traffic and i notice there were three total.. i watched in amazement as no one else around me paid any attention to it. from a far it looks like a big white light but to the naked eye and when flying over you, you can 100% tell it's an aircraft of some kind. it get's even crazier... i have taken over four videos of great footage and up close shots, i watch them record and when i go to watch them they're gone as if i never video taped anything at all. the first time it happen i let it go thinking it was my mistake but the second time it happen i threw change out the window. it's crazy that people shut their eyes to this and don't pay attention to their surroundings. i will submit the photos and videos i have been able to capture!
